ctl:test.name: wmts:Server.KVP.GET.HTTP.Mandatory
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS server observes the rules and conventions governing the use of HTTP GET operations.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server.KVP.GET.HTTP.Mandatory not tested.
Server.KVP.GET.HTTP.Mandatory test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Server.KVP.GET.InvalidQueryString
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity is an invalid query string: "request~GetCapabilities!service~!'WMTS'version~'1.0.0'" 2. the response entity is a schema-valid ows:Exception document. 3. the response entity contains an exceptionCode attribute value of "MissingParameterValue". 4. the response entity contains a locator attribute value of "service" or "request". 5. the HTTP status code value is set to 400, corresponding to the message "Bad Request".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS server returns a valid exception report and HTTP status code in response to an invalid query string.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server.KVP.GET.InvalidQueryString not tested.
Server.KVP.GET.InvalidQueryString test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Server.KVP.GET.InvalidService
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity service parameter value is "BOGUS". 2. the response entity is a schema-valid ows:Exception document. 3. the response entity contains an exceptionCode attribute value of "InvalidParameterValue". 4. the response entity contains a locator attribute value of "service". 5. the HTTP status code value is set to 400, corresponding to the message "Bad Request".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS server returns a valid exception report and HTTP status code in response to an invalid service parameter.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server.KVP.GET.InvalidService not tested.
Server.KVP.GET.InvalidService test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity request parameter value is "GetBOGUS". 2. the response entity is a schema-valid ows:Exception document. 3. the response entity contains an exceptionCode attribute value of "InvalidParameterValue". 4. the response entity contains a locator attribute value of "request". 5. the HTTP status code value is set to 400, corresponding to the message "Bad Request".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS server returns a valid exception report and HTTP status code in response to an invalid request parameter.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server.KVP.GET.InvalidRequest not tested.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Server.SOAP.POST.InvalidQueryString
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity is an invalid query document with mal-formed XML. 2. the response entity is a a SOAP 1.2 response message that contains a schema-valid ows:Exception document in the <soap:Detail> element. 3. the response entity contains an exceptionCode attribute value of "MissingParameterValue". 4. the response entity contains a locator attribute value of "service" or "request". 5. the HTTP status code value is set to 400, corresponding to the message "Bad Request".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS server returns a valid exception report and HTTP status code in response to an invalid query document.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server.SOAP.POST.InvalidQueryString not tested.
Server.SOAP.POST.InvalidQueryString test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Server.RESTful.InvalidRequest
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request invokes a URL that consists of the ServiceMetadataURL advertised in the Service Metadata document, concatenated with "/Bogus". 2. the server returns an HTTP status code of 404 (File not found).
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS server returns an HTTP status code of 404 (File not found) in response to an invalid request.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Server.RESTful.InvalidRequest not tested.
Server.RESTful.InvalidRequest test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.
